skills.name: Arrows of Verurteilung
skills.description: [SP: 0][CD: 0] Use the bow to aim and shoot (max aiming duration: 3s), dealing 650.0% ATK of Lightning DMG. Hitting an enemy weakspot creates an explosion dealing 200.0% ATK of Lightning DMG. The weapon active's CD and charging time are based on the shooting mode.

skills.name: Overture of Nightfall
skills.description: Team Lightning DMG increases by 15.0% (cannot stack). The weapon active marks enemies hit for 10s and make them take 125.0% ATK of bonus Lightning DMG every time they take Lightning DMG. 30 times max (CD: 0.1s). Marking CD: 16s.
